about_the_game:
Place your little buildings, earn a bit of cash, expand your island, repeat! Position and rotate your buildings optimally so they make the most amount of cash per day. Make enough, and your little island will start to grow. Your session ends when you run out of space to build. It's like Tetris, but cuter!




Watch your ever-expanding island kingdom grow! As you plop down buildings, roads, rivers, castle walls and more, you'll start to witness your kingdom growing before your eyes. Strategize hard to grow your kingdom as large as possible and top the leaderboards, or just sit back and enjoy a chill experience creating a fun little world.




Every session is different. As you expand, you'll discover new buildings with unique effects. Roads that multiply the income of their surroundings, but must always be connected in long segments? Rivers that triple the income of their surroundings, but can only be built downwards? Lighthouses that raise columns from the sea, allowing you to build in those final crucial positions so you can squeak out one more island expansion?




Just want to unwind? Keep your session completely stress-free in creative mode. Nothing to manage, just complete freedom to build however you feel.



Please note that this game is developed by a single developer, and is meant to be a compact package at a modest price. This is NOT your next deep 4x simulation game.

This is what you can expect from Little Oceania:


  • A chilled, relaxing experience sculpting beautiful island dioramas
  • Strategy that is easy to get into and enjoy, but hard to master
  • A tight, compact experience perfect for short and sweet sessions
  • Replay value with each run offering different shaped worlds and buildings discovered
  • A colourful and unique faux-pixel-art style
  • Endless high-score chasing and leaderboard wrangling
  • Many achievements to unlock
  • Monthly, weekly, and daily challenges where everyone has the same RNG
  • Creative mode for when you just want to shut off your brain and build something beautiful

What not to expect from Little Oceania:


  • Hours upon hours of unique content and world building
  • Resource management or deep empire simulation
  • Pages of lore and story
  • Multiplayer

While you sculpt your kingdom, it's important to plan well!


  • Use your space efficiently: rotate and orient buildings so they do not leave unused space. It's like Tetris!
  • You're always able to see where your island will grow in the following days, so make sure not to get yourself stuck!
  • Plan in advance where you think your rivers, roads, and castle walls will built: you will score huge income multipliers for long segments!
  • It can be a good idea to quickly create some areas with lower income multipliers at the start of the game instead of immediately trying to go for huge numbers: remember, you earn money every day, so early cash will keep you alive!

Little Oceania is inspired by other simple games with tight mechanics such as:


  • Islanders
  • Panorama
  • Dorfromantik
  • Thronefall

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX Catalina (10.15)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 1030
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything that makes noise - otherwise, just play while sitting by the ocean for some soothing sounds
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX Sonoma (14.3)
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything that makes noise

short_description: Little Oceania is a Tetris-like strategy building game where you create delightful kingdom dioramas by placing cute miniature structures. Plan well, create synergies, discover new structures and combos, and continually expand your picturesque ocean kingdom!
